reviewText: Please contact the appropriate sources to get this wonderful movie converted to USA standards so that we also can enjoy it.
Doesnt play on any of our TVs or laptop

This is unbelievable. I should have read the reviews because I see one with the same problem I have!!
This DVD doesn't work on either of my DVD players at home, nor on the one in my classroom. I really wanted to show this movie to my class since I'm a third grade teacher and we read the book. What a disappointment. The reason for the delay is that I didn't try playing it until today since we just finished the book in class.
I think I should get a refund. I'll just have to throw this away and that is disappointing.
Did not work.. then had to pay shipping to return it.. which cost more than the DVD. Should have just tossed it! Would not recommend this seller.
Wonderful family film!  Jeremy Irons and son, Sam, are a dynamic duo!  Really enjoyed!
wish I could watch it. does not play in my dvd player. :( not USA format
